heading: give away tunes, make money?
subheading: the big web retailers are finally beginning to realize that offering free music downloads actually increases their business. hooray for that. by jennifer sullivan.
author: jennifer sullivan
text: the grateful dead may have had it right all along. no, not by making interminable, jammy psychedelic music for only those with select drug-induced tastes. by giving it away for free.read wired news' ongoing mp3 coverage
